programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent

Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent

They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Vice Officers pose as drug dealers in an illegal drug transaction. A man is pulled over and arrested for driving a stolen vehicle. Three men are caught robbing a coin machine.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies assist border patrol in pursuit of a vehicle that has blown checkpoint and its tires. A drunk woman is pulled over not knowing she is missing a tire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E09 Guns, Hash, and Fire Hydrants
programme.desc: A chase becomes a flash flood when a fleeing driver runs into a fire hydrant. An insolent domestic violence suspect claims his girlfriend is a habitual 9-1-1 caller. Officers recover a cornucopia of contraband from a gun-toting couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call reporting an officer-involved fight. A brazen driver careens into a ditch after failing to yield. A berserk woman is pulled over for her erratic driving.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a vehicular pursuit involving a narcotics suspect. Officers respond to a domestic violence call involving a mother, daughter and the mother’s new husband to be. An officer makes an arrest in a stolen SUV case.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Odkryjmy liczby, litery, kolory i kształty poprzez zabawne i ekscytujące zadania na świeżym powietrzu z załogą AnimaCars!

programme.title: Monster Town
programme.desc: Poznaj Monster Trucks, ciężko pracujące samochody, które łączą siły, aby pomóc przyjaciołom i mieszkańcom Monster City.

programme.title: Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego gadżety na ratunek! Gdy mieszkańcy Car City potrzebują pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.desc: A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.

programme.title: NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.desc: Simon Bates with the ultimate countdown of 80s love. Yes - 100 songs with heartfelt vocals, lush strings & big breakdowns in a 9 hour marathon! Expect Whitney, Lionel & George.

programme.title: Endless Love! All Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endless Love! All Day
programme.desc: All day long - classic 80s love songs from the NOW That's What I Call Music archive. Timeless anthems of passion and heartbreak.

programme.title: Love At The Movies! with Pat Sharp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love At The Movies! with Pat Sharp
programme.desc: Grab the biggest tub of popcorn, snuggle up to your loved one & expect plenty of smooching in the back row as Pat Sharp has a session of 80s movie magic, all on the theme of lurve!

programme.title: One Hit Wonders of Love: 1980-1989
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One Hit Wonders of Love: 1980-1989
programme.desc: Ahh, the one hit wonder. They sneak up on us from nowhere, have one big hit and then never darken the UK top 20 again!

programme.title: Endless Love! All Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endless Love! All Day
programme.desc: All day long - classic 80s love songs from the NOW That's What I Call Music archive. Timeless anthems of passion and heartbreak.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Thriller!
programme.desc: It's October, and here in full for Halloween season - it's Thriller!

programme.title: Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.desc: Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 80s' biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off those mobile phones!

programme.title: Ghostbusters! 1980-1989
programme.desc: A decade of blood curdling vampires, devilish demons, freaky phantoms & ghoulish ghosts in the music & videos of the 80s!

programme.title: Sally James' Bubblegum Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sally James' Bubblegum Pop!
programme.desc: Today we'd call it Cheesy Pop! Back then it was Bubblegum Pop & TISWAS Sally has a prime selection including David Cassidy, Mungo Jerry, Lynsey De Paul, Tony Orlando & The Osmonds.

programme.title: It's A MASSIVE 70s Party Night!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It's A MASSIVE 70s Party Night!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: One Hit Wonders! 1970-1979
programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: The 1979 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1979 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.desc: Seventies music power to play loud! Work out your speakers with some pure power pop and rock including AC/DC, Kiss, and Meat Loaf!

programme.title: Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.desc: Time to show off your nerdy knowledge as Mike Read quizzes you on the stars and songs of 1979!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: 1979's One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 artists that had a single big song in 1979 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember The Flying Lizards, Quantum Leap or Fiddler's Dram?

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1979
programme.desc: 1979 was another top year in music, with pop, disco & new wave rubbing shoulders with rock, synth & 2-Tone. Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: American No.1s of 1979
programme.desc: In order - 12 videos that hit the top of the US chart in 1979. Some are obvious, but there are a few surprises along the way! Herb Alpert anyone?

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1979?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Won Wot in 1979?
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with 1979's big music award winners.

programme.title: Saturday Night's Alright!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: The Best 1976 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '76 including Boney M, Rose Royce, Thin Lizzy, Leo Sayer & Abba.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Disco Explosion!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's Disco Explosion!
programme.desc: Get down to Studio 54 with Abba on songwriting duties, the Bee Gees on production, Chic's string section & Pat Sharp on rhythm guitar!

programme.title: Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.desc: Time to show off your nerdy knowledge as Mike Read quizzes you on the stars and songs of 1979!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1979
programme.desc: 1979 was another top year in music, with pop, disco & new wave rubbing shoulders with rock, synth & 2-Tone. Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: Thirty-Three Times a Lady!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Thirty-Three Times a Lady!
programme.desc: 30+ beautiful songs from 30+ beautiful ladies! Including legends of the decade Carly Simon, Kate Bush, Tammy Wynette, Diana Ross & Carole King.

programme.title: 1970 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1970!

programme.title: Who Won Wot? 1970-1979
programme.desc: From The NME to The Grammys to the coveted 'Rear of the Year' - Mark Goodier's 10 hour marathon of 70s award winners lasts nearly as long as the Oscars!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: 60s v 70s Mixtape!
programme.desc: 28 hit songs, 14 top artists - one track as they were in the 60s, and another in the 70s - simple! From The Kinks to The King, John Lennon to Johnny Cash.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's Swinging 60s!
programme.desc: NOW 70s presents 2 hours of classic tunes from the decade before - The Swinging 60s. All brought to you by the man who was there - Sensational Tony Blackburn!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: The Best 1969 Party - Ever!

programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Thailand, France, Sweden, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Thailand - Carrot Pad Thai, France - Ground Cherry Salad, Sweden - Swedish Pecan Balls, and Italy - Corn Farroto!

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite meals – Roast Chicken Dinner! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Chicken Parmesan! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Easy Weeknight Recipes for Busy Days
programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks her way from Monday to Friday with four delicious dishes, including a Roast Beef feast and velvety Earl Grey Pudding.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Fast and Flavourful Dinners for Monday to Thursday
programme.desc: Home cook Vanessa Gianfrancesco uses her multi-cooker to whip up four comforting weeknight meals that are fast and easy.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Weeknight Dishes made in Little Thyme
programme.desc: Who has "thyme" to make dinner after a hectic day? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco inspires with four recipes including a Mushroom Thyme Risotto.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Sweet, Salty, and Surprising Multi-Cooker Recipes
programme.desc: Using a multi-cooker, charming host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up a four dishes that are salty, sweet, and surprising.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Four Flavours, Four Dishes…One Multi-Cooker!
programme.desc: Using just one pot, host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks four delicious dishes including Peachy Pulled Pork Tacos and a Lime and Basil Pie.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Hearty Weeknight Multi-Cooker Dishes
programme.desc: Do you know the secret to an uncracked cheesecake? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shares her trick to making a perfectly silky-smooth Salted Caramel Cheesecake.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Classic Sunday Dishes Made in Weeknight Time
programme.desc: Charming cook Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up four multi-cooker dishes that save on time but are bursting with flavour.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Four Fresh Dinners that are Always on Time
programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up four dinners in minutes using her multi-cooker including a delicious Lasagna and mouth-watering Burrito Bowl with Chermoula.

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a springtime menu with a table to match! There's fava beans and asparagus salad, lamb shoulder with artichokes and mint, sumac-lime green beans, deviled eggs, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa and Stefania plan an afternoon tea with a table to match! There’s tea sandwiches, scones with jam and clotted cream, mini quiche, Steffy’s banana cake, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a cajun-themed menu with a table to match! There's chili-garlic-cilantro shrimp, fajita rice, cornbread, tomato salad, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a winter-themed menu with a table to match! There's cheddar biscuits, a detox kale salad, roast beef au jus, root vegetable mash, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a vegetable-forward menu with a table to match! There's lentils and mushrooms, watermelon salad, a farro and squash wellington, Eton mess, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a Mediterranean mezze-themed menu with a table to match! There's kofta, hummus, tabbouleh, fattoush, muhammara, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa takes on take-out with a menu of homemade favorites and a table to match! There's pepperoni naan pizzas, salmon burgers, chicken fingers, a crudite platter, dips, and so much more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa and Stefania take a delicious trip down memory lane with a menu of meaningful dishes and a table to match! There’s Tuscan beans, gnocchi with a duo of sauces, short rib braciole, chocolate semifreddo, and so much more!

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Spencer Watts cooks up a nutritious meal for four featuring Crispy Lemon Chicken, Sweet Potato Rosti, and Baked Peaches.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts shows how you can make a delicious family-style roast beef dinner in about 30 minutes, for under 30 dollars.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts prepares quick, easy, and delicious dishes like Skillet Lasagna, Creamed Spinach, and Banana Ice Cream in under 30 minutes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: 30-minute meals have never tasted this good! Chef Spencer Watts offers up some secrets for the perfect fish and chips dinner.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Pailin Chongchitnant introduces us to some of her favourite and simple Thai dishes like Hot and Sour Soup and a decadent Beef Panang Curry.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Argentinian host, Natalia Machado, exquisitely prepares delicious dishes from Argentina including lamb two different ways.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Gnocchi, polenta, pesto, oh my! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shares how to make delicious Italian staples.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen showcases how easy it is to incorporate Japanese flavours into everyday meals.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isn't finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencer's tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni 'Skhug' hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts shows us some of his favourite budget-friendly Chinese take-out dishes in around 30 minutes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Breakfast for Dinner Night
programme.desc: Breakfast for dinner is quick, easy, and evERS-delicious! Host Spencer Watts makes some breakfast classics like a Skillet BLT Frittata.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: What's fun for the whole family? Pizza night! Chef Spencer Watts makes two easy, budget-friendly pizzas for a delicious family-style meal.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Curry in a Hurry Night
programme.desc: Indian meals are the epitome of a full family dinner. Host Spencer Watts uses bold flavours to make classic Butter Chicken and refreshing Mango Lassi.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: The key ingredient in this episode of One World Kitchen is mangoes! Host Vijaya Selvaraju uses mangoes for some classic Indian dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Ever crave a delicious Indian feast? Host Vijaya Selvaraju cooks up Indian classics for a delightful family meal.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Charming host Vijaya Selvaraju demystifies a number of Indian dishes like Dal Soup in a crockpot and Fish in (three-ingredient) Red Chili Chutney.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Cheerful host Vijaya Selvaraju shows us just how easy Indian dishes can be incorporated into everyday meals.

programme.title: Cook The Books
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: Super Tonics by Meredith Youngson! Follow along as Shahir prepares healthy, delicious beverages and foods including brownie batter chia pudding, a blue lavender latte, chai cinnamon roll baked oatmeal, and much more!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Garbanzo Beans and Grapefruit
programme.desc: In this fast-paced episode, host Theresa Visintin uses two unlikely ingredients that start with the letter "G," garbanzo beans and grapefruit! First up, Theresa cooks socca, a savoury garbanzo bean pancake recipe, and infuses it with Mediterranean flavours. To make her batter, Theresa combines chickpea flour with salty olives, sweet red pepper, and fresh basil. Once the batter is ready to go, she fries the savoury crepe. Next up, Theresa balances tart grapefruit with a sweet buttery lobster tail. But that's not sweet enough for Theresa! She prepares sabayon, a delicate honey custard that melts in your mouth. Finally, Theresa shows us how to make a mouth-watering dish by combining...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chicken and corn are the key players in this letter “C” challenge. Chef Lauren Gulyas prepares one of her favourite Italian dishes, chicken Marsala. Using garlic, shallots, and white wine, Chef Lauren whips up a rich Marsala sauce that is nutty and floral in flavour. Next, she transforms corn into a creamy polenta topping for her Shepard’s pie...with a twist! Sautéing onion, garlic, and lean ground beef, she uses Worcestershire sauce and tomato paste to give the pie filling an extra flavour boost. Once she finishes those dishes, Chef Lauren creates a mouth-watering recipe that combines both chicken and corn.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kaffir Lime and Kohlrabi
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell has a challenge on his hands after picking the letter “K.” He decides to use ingredients kaffir lime and kohlrabi. First, Robert re-invents the ordinary shrimp skewer, using lemongrass as the skewer (yes, the skewer!). He brings the flavour to the next level with zesty kaffir lime. Using the leaves of the kaffir lime with fresh herbs, Robert makes a dipping sauce for the skewer. Next, Robert fries up salty peameal bacon in one pan and sautés earthy kohlrabi with leeks, potato, and garlic in another. He brings the ingredients together into a single skillet, adding eggs and baking it into a hearty frittata. For his final dish, Robert uses both kaffir lime and kohlrabi in...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: “A” is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: America From Above
programme.desc: Part one of a new series of ambient drone films for relaxation, America From Above is a spectacular yet ultra-soothing 1-hour long natural journey that sweeps viewers gently above America's vistas. You'll begin the farmlands of Iowa, soaring west through the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, then on to Utah's iconic red rock landscapes and finally ending on the West Coast with a familiar voyage over Big Sur and then back to San Diego just in time for sunset.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Off The Grid Zanskar, India
programme.desc: On reaching Zanskar, Alex visits Karsha Monastery, the largest one in Zanskar. She ends her stay after exploring the Sani Kanika Monastery, built in 17th century and the stupa.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Spas Movenpick, Jordan
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries many different spa treatments, which leave her skin glowing, at the Movenpick Resort in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Food Fact Fun Tainan, Taiwan
programme.desc: In Tainan, Alex tries local delicacies, visits Sun Moon Lake, Taiwanese Aboriginal Culture Village, Yanshui Catholic church, Ten Drum creative park and goes paragliding.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Off The Grid Srinagar, India
programme.desc: Alex is in Srinagar putting up on a houseboat. She explores the Dal lake, tries Kashmiri Tea, and ends her day with a traditional Kashmiri platter – Wazwan.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Food Fact Fun Yilan, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex explores Yilan starting from Xing-Yuan tea farm, then visits Farmers’ Market, tries a duck delicacy. Further he visits a Museum, a Whiskey Distillery, National Centre for Traditional Arts, enjoys a high speed train ride and treks up to experience the beauty of a waterfall.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Off The Grid Tsomoriri, India
programme.desc: Alexandra starts her journey from Tsomoriri where on the way she stops at Baralacha Pass. Later she visits Korzok village, interacts with locals and dresses up in a traditional Ladakhi attire.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Which is the UNESCO City of Literature? Here's a clue - it's also the treasure trove of Guinness! Taste the merriment in Dublin.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nagthat, India
programme.desc: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites. However, Rohan goes there with his travel buddy, Healer, looking for adventures. Their first stop is a small, mountain village, Nagthat, where the locals give them a unique welcome. As they set out to explore the surroundings, they chance upon a beautiful waterfall.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Off The Grid Leh. India
programme.desc: Alexandra explores the rugged region of Leh, visiting Thiksey Monastery, Leh Palace and Shanti Stupa. Later she sets out for a five hour drive to the picturesque Pangong Lake and stays in the tent.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Driving along the world's longest defined coastal route has a lot of surprises in store. Right from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nag Tibba, India
programme.desc: Situated on the foothills of Uttarakhand’s Garhwal mountains, Nag Tibba is a popular trekking destination. At an altitude of 3100 meters above sea level, this mountain peak is believed to be the abode of the god of serpents. As Healer and Rohan embark on this trek, they pass local villages and forests, and catch breathtaking views of the Himalayas along the way.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Off The Grid Nubra valley, India
programme.desc: A 106 feet Buddha statue mesmerizes Alex as she explores Diskit Monastery in Nubra Valley. She tries the traditional ladakhi food and explores Leh city, by visiting Gurdwara Pathar Sahib and a school.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Relive the glories of Irish aristocracy as if no time has gone by, in the castles of Ireland. Relish the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Food Fact Fun Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In Taipei, Alex visits major attractions such as Modern Toilet Restaurant, Chiang Kai Shek memorial hall, Longshan Temple and Taipei 101.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Off The Grid Kargil, India
programme.desc: Alexandra explores Kargil, where she is invited for breakfast by the owner of a resort where she is putting up and understands the influence of the cultures on the locals.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Rishikesh, India
programme.desc: The sacred city of Rishikesh is a haven for pilgrims, yogis and adventure lovers from all around the world. Healer and Rohan experience the thrill of river rafting on the spirited rapids of the holy river Ganga. After this adrenaline rush, they visit a quiet beach to cool off but are surprised and amused to see it filled with couples on pre wedding shoots.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
